---
name: 构建应用infra镜像
about: 根据分支目录构建infra镜像并推送到镜像仓库
title: '【Auto-build】CoreDNS'
assignees: ''

---

```
Usage:
   /imagebuild_apps appName appVersion baranchName

Available Args:
   appName:  current app dir
   appVersion: current app version
   
Example:
   /imagebuild_apps  coredns v1.0.0-rc1 
```
